text:
<!channel> ( @chriscowley ) - we now have an arm64 Linux build in our "tip" version...  NOTE - this is extremely minimally tested (i.e. I chucked it on an arm64 centos7 platform in <http://packet.net|packet.net> ... and it worked, but YMMV) - please treat it like "alpha" feature.  To install - use "tip" version, like:
`curl -s get.rebar.digital/tip | bash -s -- install --isolated --drp-version=tip`
@rackneng I'll try it on oDroid C2 when I get a chance. The Rpi is not ARM64 though - it is ARMv7 :-)
While ARM64 sits me, I think the wider community would benefit more from an ARMv7 build
